name: Cherry's Trial
description:
A 2D Metroidvania. Find your way out of Purgatory to prove yourself worthy of becoming a Grim Reaper.

Controls:

-Move with directional keys

-Space to skip text/Shoot blades

-Z to jump (Double jumping and wall jumping is possible)

-C to dash

-V to shoot tranquillizers 

-Escape key to pause

*Note if an empty textbox appears hit the space key to initiate dialogue

Used AisuKaze Studio's Metroidvania Controller from the Unity Asset Store

Thank you so much for playing! Feedback is greatly appreciated!
